item.title: Europe’s revenge on U.S. tariffs will hit America where it hurts most, targeting treasured exports like bourbon, jeans, and motorcycles
item.description: U.S. tariffs on steel and aluminum “will not go unanswered,” European Union chief Ursula von der Leyen said.

item.title: The C-suite anxiety index: Here’s who’s worried about losing their job
item.description: Anxiety levels in the corporate world are actually lower this year than they were last year.

item.title: Bill Gates uses the ‘love and logic’ parenting style with his children that his dad used to support him
item.description: Bill Gates says his father's "love and logic" parenting technique was so effective he used it with his own children.

item.title: Elon Musk’s $97.4 billion bid for OpenAI could cause problems for Sam Altman
item.description: An Elon Musk–led bid for OpenAI's nonprofit assets could cause issues for Sam Altman's ambitions to turn the AI lab into a for-profit corporation.

item.title: Patients call out fat-shaming doctors for hurting their health: ‘I always go in with my guard up’
item.description: Weight bias is pervasive in medical settings, say experts.
